Class MovieResultsController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.MovieResultsController
public class MovieResultsController extends Object
Controller for managing movie search result displays. Handles the title, image, and clipping of movie items in the search results.
Author:
Make

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Ensures the search name label grows horizontally within its container.

    • setResult

      public void setResult(Movie movie)
      Sets the details for a search result item, including its image and title.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object containing the details to display.

    • setImage

      private void setImage(Movie movie, int height)
      Sets the image for the search result item, applying a clipping effect.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object containing the image path.
      height - The desired height of the image in pixels.

    • setTitle

      private void setTitle(Movie movie)
      Sets the title text for the search result item.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object containing the title.

    • getClip

      private javafx.scene.Node getClip(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double radiusTop, double radiusBot)
      Creates a clipping path for the search result image, giving it rounded corners.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView to apply the clipping effect to.
      radiusTop - The ratio of the top corner radius relative to the height of the image.
      radiusBot - The ratio of the bottom corner radius relative to the height of the image.
      Returns:
      A Node containing the clipping path for the image.
